name: unit_2-project-etheral-sparkle-community
description: I wish to explore the world of gemstones without necessarily registring to the platform. If the content of the application was to be found interesting, I would gladly join this web community. I expect the app to provide me with a secure point of access for the rescources I might be sharing. Similarly, I expect to have abilty to modify the content I opt to share. Finally, an easy removal of added content also includes some of the basic functionalities I expect to encounter.
author: Danilo Radonjic
